entry.title: microsoft/WindowsAppSDK - Releases - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
v1.5.0

Windows App SDK 1.5.0 (1.5.240227000)

WinAppSDK 1.5.0 is the latest stable version of WinAppSDK providing new features and improvements to the platform.

New features include:

  • XAML Islands runtime and shutdown updates
  • The new WinUI Maps control and new SelectorBar control
  • Labels in the CommandBarFlyout primary commands

Additional updates include:

  • Support for .NET 8
  • Improved debugging tools and source availability

To see everything that's new and changed, see the full Windows App SDK 1.5 release notes.

See the WinAppSDK 1.5 milestone and WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.5 milestone for a list of issues addressed in this release.

Try it out

  • Download the 1.5.240227000 NuGet package to use WinAppSDK 1.5 in your app.
  • Download and update the WinUI Gallery to see the WinUI 3 updates firsthand.

Getting Started

To get started using Windows App SDK to develop Windows apps, check out the following documentation:

  • Install developer tools .
  • Create a WinUI 3 app.
  • Continue your development journey.
